Uses of Interface
org.opengrok.indexer.configuration.Nameable

  • Packages that use Nameable 
    Package Description
    org.opengrok.indexer.authorization  
    org.opengrok.indexer.configuration  

    • Uses of Nameable in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization

      Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization that implement Nameable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthorizationEntity
      This class covers authorization entities used in opengrok.
      class  AuthorizationPlugin
      This is a subclass of AuthorizationEntity and is a wrapper to a IAuthorizationPlugin delegating the decision methods to the contained plugin.
      class  AuthorizationStack
      Subclass of AuthorizationEntity.
      Methods in org.opengrok.indexer.authorization with parameters of type Nameable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean AuthorizationEntity.isAllowed(Nameable entity, AuthorizationEntity.PluginDecisionPredicate pluginPredicate, AuthorizationEntity.PluginSkippingPredicate skippingPredicate)
      Test the given entity if it should be allowed with this authorization check.
      boolean AuthorizationStack.isAllowed(Nameable entity, AuthorizationEntity.PluginDecisionPredicate pluginPredicate, AuthorizationEntity.PluginSkippingPredicate skippingPredicate)
      Test the given entity if it should be allowed with in this stack context if and only if the stack is not marked as failed.
      boolean AuthorizationPlugin.isAllowed(Nameable entity, AuthorizationEntity.PluginDecisionPredicate pluginPredicate, AuthorizationEntity.PluginSkippingPredicate skippingPredicate)
      Test the underlying plugin with the predicate if and only if the plugin is not marked as failed.
      protected boolean AuthorizationStack.processStack(Nameable entity, AuthorizationEntity.PluginDecisionPredicate pluginPredicate, AuthorizationEntity.PluginSkippingPredicate skippingPredicate)
      Process the stack.

    • Uses of Nameable in org.opengrok.indexer.configuration

      Classes in org.opengrok.indexer.configuration that implement Nameable 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Group
      Placeholder for the information about subgroups of projects and repositories.
      class  Project
      Placeholder for the information that builds up a project.
